genre.name: action
genre.description: a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats

genre.name: drama
genre.decription: Drama Films are serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations that portray realistic characters in conflict with either themselves, others, or forces of nature

director.name: Francis
director.bio: Francis Ford Coppola is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is considered one of the major figures of the New Hollywood filmmaking movement of the 1960s and 1970s

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
